alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 2:37PM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches possible with higher totals in the highest elevations. Winds could gust as high as 80 mph. * WHERE...Southern Gila Highlands/Black Range. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage and white out conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong damaging winds and white-out conditions are possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
